greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: E.g.f. cos(tan(x)) (even powers only).
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
program: a(n):=if n=0 then 1 else 2*sum((sum(binomial(j-1,2*m-1)*j!*2^(2*n-j-1)*(-1)^(n+j)*stirling2(2*n,j),j,2*m,2*n))/(2*m)!,m,0,n); /* _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 28 2011 */
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_, _Simon Plouffe_
